sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_01cc295c83b072107f44e8be50da1e98
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Update Feedback</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    try {
        var body = request.body.data;

        if (!body || !body.enrollmentID) {
            response.setStatus(400);
            return { error: "Missing required field: enrollmentID" };
        }

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ai_complia_0_training_enrollments');
        gr.addQuery('number', body.enrollmentID);
        gr.query();

		
        if (gr.next()) {
			
			// Training Enrollments 
            gr.setValue('feedback', body.feedback);
            gr.update();
			
            response.setStatus(200);
            return {
                message: "Feedback provided successfully",
                enrollmentID: body.enrollmentID
            };
        } else {
            response.setStatus(404);
            return { error: "Enrollment not found" };
        }
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error("Scripted REST API error: " + e.message);
        response.setStatus(500);
        return { error: "Internal server error" };
    }
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ai_complia_0/ai_literacy/updatefeedback</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updatefeedback</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-21 02:25:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>01cc295c83b072107f44e8be50da1e98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Feedback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI Compliance Command Center" source="x_snc_ai_complia_0">7a91febe83a032107f44e8be50da1e4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI Compliance Command Center">7a91febe83a032107f44e8be50da1e4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_01cc295c83b072107f44e8be50da1e98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-21 02:25:42</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="AI Literacy">fb8d0a37836032107f44e8be50da1ed9</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_acefc6bb836032107f44e8be50da1ea7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Update Training Status</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    try {
        var body = request.body.data;

        if (!body || !body.enrollmentID) {
            response.setStatus(400);
            return { error: "Missing required field: enrollmentID" };
        }

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ai_complia_0_training_enrollments');
        gr.addQuery('number', body.enrollmentID);
        gr.query();

		var gr2 = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ai_complia_0_ai_access_employee');
		gr2.addQuery('number', body.employeeID);
        gr2.query();

		var gr3 = new GlideRecord('x_snc_ai_complia_0_evidence_pack');
		gr3.addQuery('number', body.evidenceID);
        gr3.query();

        if (gr.next() && gr2.next() && gr3.next()) {
			var evidenceRecordSysId = gr3.getUniqueValue();
			// Training Enrollments 
            gr.setValue('completion_date', new GlideDateTime());
            gr.setValue('training_results', body.results || '');
			gr.setValue('evidence', evidenceRecordSysId);
			gr.setValue('status', 'completed');
            gr.update();

			// AI Access Employee
			gr2.setValue('needs_ai_training', false);
			gr2.update();

			// Evidence Pack
			gr3.setValue('digital_signature', body.signature);
			gr3.setValue('signed_by', body.agent);
			gr3.setValue('hashed_data', body.results || '');
			gr3.update();
			
            response.setStatus(200);
            return {
                message: "Enrollment updated successfully",
                enrollmentID: body.enrollmentID
            };
        } else {
            response.setStatus(404);
            return { error: "Enrollment not found" };
        }
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error("Scripted REST API error: " + e.message);
        response.setStatus(500);
        return { error: "Internal server error" };
    }
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_ai_complia_0/ai_literacy/updatetrainingstatus</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updatetrainingstatus</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-19 16:10:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>acefc6bb836032107f44e8be50da1ea7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Training Status</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI Compliance Command Center" source="x_snc_ai_complia_0">7a91febe83a032107f44e8be50da1e4b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI Compliance Command Center">7a91febe83a032107f44e8be50da1e4b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_acefc6bb836032107f44e8be50da1ea7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-21 03:10:58</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="AI Literacy">fb8d0a37836032107f44e8be50da1ed9</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
